title: Backend Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Kapwing turns video editing, traditionally a heavyweight, time consuming workflow, into a joyful, collaborative experience. We believe that we can use technology to augment the video editing and content creation experience, and we've already started on this path with a wide array of templates, AI applications, and new pipelines for combining tooling with the best AI models. 

As a Backend and Infrastructure Engineer, you will play an instrumental role in maintaining our backend video processing services, while optimizing our infrastructure to balance performance with reliability.

Join us on our journey to democratize creative tools and invent the future stack of video creation.

Job Responsibilities

  • Expand and maintain our cloud video processing services. Solve engineering challenges related to performance, quality, and reliability of video editing.
  • Develop infrastructure for distributed computing workloads, maximizing performance while minimizing cost.
  • Implement monitoring, alerting, and logging solutions for identifying application performance bottlenecks on a website serving 10 million visitors per month.
  • Create a culture of engineering excellence by refining our processes, documentation, and cross-functional systems.

Job Requirements

  • Experience developing production-grade Python applications, emphasizing performance, reliability, and maintainability.
  • Familiarity with containerized environments (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) and modern cloud platforms (e.g., GCP, AWS, Azure).
  • Proficiency with application performance monitoring tools such as New Relic, Datadog, or equivalents, and with centralized logging systems such as Graylog or Elasticsearch.
  • (Bonus) Experience in video engineering, including tools such as FFmpeg, ImageMagick, and video player or machine vision pipelines.
  • (Bonus) Experience developing compute-intensive, asynchronous systems that handle bursty or large-scale workloads.
